content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good day, Juan. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Very well, Juan. I agree to the rental price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to negotiate the rental price. Can we discuss it further?

I want to find the lowest possible rental price.

I am a student, so I have a tight budget.

I don't want to overpay for the apartment.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. Let's discuss the rental price further. Can you tell me more about your budget as a student? Also, what is the length of your lease and do you have any other requirements for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine
